Loyal Primark fans have been schlepping to the affordable retailer for years, but now there's finally a way to get your hands on Primark's famous offerings without ever leaving the house - and it includes fast delivery.

Whilst Primark's own website doesn't allow eager customers to shop online, you can now beat the crowds and order them on Amazon instead.

From fashionable basics to novelty hen party gifts - and even an array of items from their best-selling Harry Potter range, many of the items also include Amazon's iconic free next day delivery too - as long as you're a member of Prime.

(Image: Getty Images for Primark)

To get Primark's offerings on Amazon, just head to the Amazon website and search 'Primark' , where a whole range of homeware products and pyjamas comes up and even some clothing by its in-store brand Atomsphere.

We've found many of the retailer's Disney ranges are on there too including its Christmas baubles, and beauty products are available as well.

Some of our favourite items of the lot include the statement Gryffindor beanie, emblazoned with the house's crest with red and yellow detailing for £9.99 , just in time for winter.

There's also a £9.99 'Team Bride' glitter make-up purse or clutch bag that's perfect for hen dos, and £20 Beauty and the Beast pyjamas that are covered with an adorable Chip cup design.

Even the famous Chip Mug is there, albeit for a hefty £22.42.

Perfect for all those last minute Disney fashion disasters...
description: Primark shoppers will be delighted to know that it's not even easier to get hold of the brand's famous clothes
